TT:  Let's just say it's not ALWAYS best to keep your mouth shut.  
And the=
 onlyway to atone is to kill my own brother.  My on oil and 
steel.  Let's =
just leave it at that o.k..

{Panthos}

    Panthos raised a feline eye bro=
w. "Well well well for a moment I figured you were a maximal with a chip on=
 his shoulder. Guess that statement  prove sit otherwise. Can't see any of =
them going after thier own kin like we preds would. Then again a pred like =
myself wouldn't be looking for atonement about anything..."

    The panthe=
r sort of grinned letting his fangs show quite fully. "So where's this brot=
her of yours to? I take it cybertron rather than this dirt ball but one can=
 never tell these days..."
